    • Method Detail

      • handleInput

        public boolean handleInput​(int oldRow,
                           int oldCol,
                           int newRow,
                           int newCol,
                           char upgrade)
        check thoroughly if the inputs provided by the users are valid inputs, by running through numbers of check methods
        Parameters:
        oldRow - the current row of the piece that is about to be moved
        oldCol - the current column of the piece that is about to be moved
        newRow - the row, to which the piece will move
        newCol - the column, to which the piece will move
        upgrade - the piece that pawn would get promoted to if allowed
        Returns:
        true if input is valid, otherwise return false

        Returns:

      • getFileIndex

        public int getFileIndex​(char s)
        Get the index of the given file s
        Parameters:
        s - file
        Returns:
        an integer representing the given file s. Return -1 s is an incorrect file.

      • main
